ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | joinlmuladdmuld.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |

| 3 |  | joinlmuladdmuld.3 | |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | joinlmuladdmuld.4 | |- ( ph -> ( ( A x. B ) + ( C x. B ) ) = D ) |

| 6 | 5, 4 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( ( A + C ) x. B ) = D ) |
